  3. Rockstar Games co-founder on why GTA didn't go back to a London setting – 'the game was so much about America'  TechRadar
  4. ‘Grand Theft Auto’ writer explains why ‘GTA: London’ will never happen  NME
  5. Why you'll never steal a car in GTA: London -  Happy Mag

item.title: Amazon Cancels Their Biggest 'Lord of the Rings' Project - Collider
item.description:
1. Amazon Cancels Their Biggest 'Lord of the Rings' Project  Collider
  2. The tech industry came for Steam and whiffed so hard that it's had to admit that it didn't even really like making games in the first place  PC Gamer
  3. Season 10 Minor - Release Notes  newworld.com
  4. Amazon have reportedly cancelled their Lord Of The Rings MMO, again  Rock Paper Shotgun
